mapper.insert: insert into type_one (type_one_id, type_one_name, type_one_num, type_one_remark) values (#{typeOneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeOneName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeOneNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeOneRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select type_one_id, type_one_name, type_one_num, type_one_remark from type_one
